item.description:
The last of the outdoor series, and they have been great!
Join us and who knows, maybe you'll meet THE ONE! if you are looking LOL
Great relaxed atmosphere, with a casual dress code, collared shirts for men.
Cash bar, Super music from 60's to Top 40, and a few ice breakers too.
Doors open at 8 pm and the cost is $5 till 8:30, and then goes to $10 so get there early.
Will have a meetup table reserved for those that are shy.
See you then.
Angelo
item.how_to_find_us: You can always ask around, I'm all over the place.
item.name: End of Summer Bummer Dance Party, where did it go???????
